mapper.select: SELECT p.project_no, pm.member_no, t.task_title, a.task_no, a.file_type, a.file_name, a.file_path, a.file_register_date FROM project p JOIN project_member pm ON p.project_no = pm.project_no JOIN task t ON p.project_no = t.project_no JOIN attached_file a ON t.task_no = a.task_no WHERE pm.member_no = #{member_no} AND a.file_path IS NOT NULL

SELECT p.project_no, pm.member_no, t.task_title, a.task_no, a.file_type, a.file_name, a.file_path, a.file_register_date FROM project p JOIN project_member pm ON p.project_no = pm.project_no JOIN task t ON p.project_no = t.project_no JOIN attached_file a ON t.task_no = a.task_no WHERE pm.member_no = #{member_no} AND p.project_no = #{project_no} AND a.file_path IS NOT NULL ORDER BY a.task_no DESC;
